item.description:
Have you wanted to meditate but been unable to find an effective path? Are you stuck in mental habits that make achieving stillness difficult? If these struggles sound familiar, our meditation workshop is for you. By learning to bring body and mind to complete stillness, you will take the first step toward enjoying the full benefits of deep meditation.

Spend a few hours in the company of others seeking to discover the profound rest and inner peace that comes with meditation. Each session includes periods of meditative practice, practical advice, inspirational reading and discussion.

These workshops are for beginners or those with little meditation experience, and no previous experience is required.  Preregistration is encouraged, but not required.

8:30 - 9:00 am:  registration and refreshments

         

9:00 - 12 noon: workshop

Registration

  • Schedule: 02/19/2012
  • Fee: $40.00 (pre-registration is suggested but not required)
  • You can register on our website: http://www.advaitameditation.org/courses-activities/meditation-offering.php?id=6

For more information on meditation classes, please contact us at 781-647-0020 or info@advaitameditation.org.
